title: Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei Jo: Zetsubou Shoujo Senshuu
title_jp: さよなら絶望先生 序〜絶望少女撰集〜
synopsis: A special summary episode of the first season of Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei, focusing on seven of the girls: Komori Kiri, Matoi Tsunetsuki, Kobushi Abiru, Kimura Kaere, Kitsu Chiri, Sekiuchi "Maria" Tarou and Hitou Nami.
